name: Garden Survivor
description:
The title doesn't reference to the facebook account named "GardenSurvivor" and is by no means related to it.

A top-down shooter where you play as a sunflower trying to survive waves of white circles, that got angry because the creator of this game didn't draw them!

As a flower, you can take root to heal yourself, but beware!  while doing so, you cannot move, using your arrows keys or wasd buttons! You can however shoot seeds with the left mouse button to kill these pesky little circles!

All code, art and sound made myself except:

 -dirt texture: https://www.deviantart.com/fabooguy/art/Dirt-Ground-Texture-Tileable-2048x2048-4...

 -itch.io page background grass: grass texture 4 by visualsnacktm on DeviantArt

 -shoot sound: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f53fti1kwgc but pitched up

 -music: "slider" from Super Mario 64

made in 2h59min27s
